entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who responded to Lockhart's question about wanting autographs. He is described as raising his eyebrows at Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who asked Professor Lockhart if he should be wandering around the corridors. He is also described as having met Lockhart before.

entities.name: lockhart
entities.description: Lockhart is introduced as a professor who used to teach at Hogwarts and is now wandering around the corridors. He is described as having a smile that fades slowly from his face.

relationships.description: Lockhart asks Harry if they have met before, and Harry confirms that they have. This is mentioned in the text as 'Haven't we met?'
